definition: a half-suppressed or muttered complaint : grumbling
a low indistinct but often continuous sound
examples: the murmur of the waves along the shore
the murmur of nannies cooing into baby carriages

definition: an atypical sound of the heart typically indicating a functional or structural abnormality
examples: The physician detected a heart murmur in his patient.
the breeze murmured in the pines
